name: HotHands Adhesive Body Warmers, 40ct
categoryPath: Sports & Outdoors/Outdoor Sports/Camping/Camping Accessories/Compasses & Survival Kits

reviews.name: HotHands Adhesive Body Warmers, 40ct
reviews.reviewText: The adhesive body hot pack is great to put on a sore neck. It adheres well to clothing. It also gives continuous relief for about 8 hours.
reviews.title: Great hot pack for a sore neck.

reviews.name: HotHands Adhesive Body Warmers, 40ct
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, it really helps keep your core warm.
reviews.title: product works great!

reviews.name: HotHands Adhesive Body Warmers, 40ct
reviews.reviewText:
I just received this product yesterday. However, I do use them often for pain in my hips and back. I am just using the last of my original supply. When i put one of them on I am able to get heat on the aching area and still move around the house.

As for how long they last -- I find I frequently get 12 to 14 hours of heat out of them.
reviews.title: HotHands Adhesive Body Warmers are GREAT

reviews.name: HotHands Adhesive Body Warmers, 40ct
reviews.reviewText: I've used the hand warmers. These are great. They have adhesive to keep them in place. Good idea.
reviews.title: They stay in place

reviews.name: HotHands Adhesive Body Warmers, 40ct
reviews.reviewText: This product works weel but the delivery date was way off.
reviews.title: works well
